entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
